overview:
Randy Henry is the Co-Founder and Director of Sales at Ad Knights.

During his time in retail banking, Randy lead successful sales teams, which gave team members an opportunity to set themselves apart from the competition. Randy wears many hats within our company. While he conducts the day-to-day operations, he also finds new innovative ways to put advertisements in front of consumers. As Director of Sales, Randy believes in two important core values that are imperative to a companyâ€™s success, Acquire and build upon existing relationships.

Randyâ€™s sales expertise allows him to find and negotiate new clientele as well as continue to build upon the relationships already established with current clients. Randy currently holds a B.B.A. in general business from Lamar University in Beaumont, Texas.
